content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Engineering is in our DNA. Since 1993, we've helped the world's leading companies imagine, design, engineer, and deliver software that changes the world. Today, we are more than developers. We are the experts that will take customers' business to the next level.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VALUE PROPOSITION: WHY EPAM?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM, we believe that technology defines business success, and we relentlessly pursue the best solution for every client to solve where others fail. We work together in diverse teams to innovate and deliver RESULTS. RELENTLESSLY.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":22924,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7b49c13c-334b-4fef-a217-ab24a9b7c330/image2018-12-17_16-46-25.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7b49c13c-334b-4fef-a217-ab24a9b7c330/image2018-12-17_16-46-25.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"image2018-12-17_16-46-25.png\",\"name\":\"image2018-12-17_16-46-25.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7b49c13c-334b-4fef-a217-ab24a9b7c330\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":637,\"height\":390},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR PILLARS: WHO IS EPAM?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our brand pillars are the most important attributes of the brand and business that we would like to communicate.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1460955,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1113c949-c23a-4b11-bc27-2a0b55ba66a3/Pillars.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1113c949-c23a-4b11-bc27-2a0b55ba66a3/Pillars.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Pillars.PNG\",\"name\":\"Pillars.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1113c949-c23a-4b11-bc27-2a0b55ba66a3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055,\"height\":353.4517766497462},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DEVELOPERS' DEVELOPERS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(57, 194, 215)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are proud of our heritage as Developers' Developers. We've helped large corporations and technology giants innovate and bring unique products to market: From the roots of SAP's CRM applications to Google's YouTube Creator Academy to driving market-leading performance for Expedia, to connecting transactions around the world for EBAY, EPAM persists in playing a significant role in digital transformation around the globe.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We continue to build our expertise and our capabilities for the world's leading technology companies.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"COMMITTED PARTNERS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(57, 194, 215)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are relentless in our pursuit of solutions that help our clients and we deliver where others often fall short. We do the right thing, every time – because it's right.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We invest in EPAMers around the world, helping to find and develop the brightest minds and to build dynamic, lasting careers.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our client projects become communities, which spark innovation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PROBLEM SOLVERS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(57, 194, 215)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As technology drives unprecedented change in traditional and emerging industries, our clients demand more than excellence in engineering. They demand solutions to business challenges that are here today and to those that will become challenges tomorrow.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We bring agility, deep insights and the best engineering capability in the world, to simplify complexity and solve what others cannot.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR VALUES: WHAT MATTERS MOST TO EPAM?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We value five core values and their corresponding actions, which determine the way we work from day to day. It all starts with our values – without them, our future successes would be unthinkable.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":43854,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/03cfe670-7d3a-428a-be1e-8e7b067737db/values.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/03cfe670-7d3a-428a-be1e-8e7b067737db/values.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"values.PNG\",\"name\":\"values.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"03cfe670-7d3a-428a-be1e-8e7b067737db\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":888,\"height\":665},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"OUR PERSONALITY: HOW DOES EPAM DO IT?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We believe that we are different from other companies and we express ourselves in a way that makes it clear that we personify these traits. Six adjectives describe how we approach our work.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":62992,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a4738edf-9f5d-4b51-b82d-633dd855ae27/image2018-12-17_16-49-3.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a4738edf-9f5d-4b51-b82d-633dd855ae27/image2018-12-17_16-49-3.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"image2018-12-17_16-49-3.png\",\"name\":\"image2018-12-17_16-49-3.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a4738edf-9f5d-4b51-b82d-633dd855ae27\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":772,\"height\":513},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Useful
